text:
Liga
Bar√ßa / Real Madrid: Erling Haaland would make Spain's big boys salivate
Erling Haaland, Red Bull striker Salzburg, scored again in the Champions League against Napoli last night. The 19-year-old Norwegian is interested in Real Madrid and FC Barcelona.
06 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Mourad Bennis

FIFA 20: the notes of Real Madrid players




Author of a start of the stratospheric season with his club Salzburg (22 goals in 16 games), Erling Haaland would be the subject of a battle between Real Madrid and FC Barcelona.




Haaland is dazzling




Erling Haaland + 29 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Last night in Naples, Norwegian Erling Haaland scored again. For his first 4 league games with Red Bull Salzburg, the striker has scored 7 times. Endowed with an exceptional sense of purpose and good technical quality, some European teams are starting to get serious.
According to Marca, Real Madrid and FC Barcelona are on the line to welcome him next season. The player of 19 would be valued at 100 million euros.
